thread.title: Don't leave! Chris Smalling calls on Zlatan Ibrahimovic to extend his stay at Manchester United
thread.title_full: Don't leave! Chris Smalling calls on Zlatan Ibrahimovic to extend his stay at Manchester United

author: Steve Bates
title: Don't leave! Chris Smalling calls on Zlatan Ibrahimovic to extend his stay at Manchester United
text:
Don't leave! Chris Smalling calls on Zlatan Ibrahimovic to extend his stay at Manchester United The 35-year-old Swedish superstar has been coy about his future Share Zlatan Ibrahimovic is yet to commit his future to Manchester United (Photo: Getty) Share Get Manchester United FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe 
Chris Smalling wants Zlatan Ibrahimovic to stay at Old Trafford next season. 
So far, the 35-year-old Swedish superstar has been coy about his future and whether he will trigger the contract option of a second year at United after his stunning impact since arriving for the first time in English football. 
But England defender Smalling insists the entire United dressing room wants him to commit to another season at Old Trafford – and maybe longer after seeing him rattle in 23 goals in 35 appearances. 
“I would definitely like to see Zlatan stay here,” says Smalling, “because you can see how he has performed this year and the goals he has scored. Ibrahimovic has impressed at Old Trafford (Photo: Getty Images) Read More Manchester United are becoming scary again under Jose Mourinho, says Wes Brown 
“If we can keep a player like that for as long as we can then all the players would be very happy with that. 
“I’m not sure how long he can go on but I don’t think age is a factor with him whatsoever. He has played as many games as anyone in the squad and contributed as well. It is down to how long he wants to go on. 
“When you have a focal point like him he just wants to score goals. Even in the last couple of games when maybe we have not been playing as well as we have done, when you can score goals and rely on people like that it’s brilliant.” Like us on Facebook
